Name: Tier 1: Minimum Information/Material & Methods
Description: Reporting qualitative effects, or effects that require simple quantification including the identification of objects larger than the resolution limit followed by basic  feature extraction and statistical analysis

Name: Tier 2: Advanced Quantification and/or Live Cell Imaging
Description: Identification and localization of diffraction-limited particles, super-resolution microscopy, tracking of intracellular dynamics

Name: Tier 3: Manufacturing/Technical Development/Full Documentation
Description: Full documentation of microscopic setup, image acquisition and quality control
